result.title: Codeforces Heatmap
result.content:
Github provides users with a heatmap which serves as a visual tool to assess contributions in open-source.

I have for a long time felt the need of a similar tool on Codeforces so that I can keep track of how much practice I am getting and how much more I need to do to meet my set goals.

As no such tool existed within the visible quarters of the internet already, I decided to embark on the journey for it's creation myself. Here I present to you Codeforces Heatmap which plots the number of submissions a user makes over time on Codeforces on heatmap.

Here is the link to the Github repo if you wish to fork, star, or send pull requests. Also, feel free to submit bug reports or suggest any improvements.

Hope this small tool will help you track and improve you practice and contest performance.

Many thanks to Mike Mirzayanov for providing an excellent API allowing developers to create awesome stuff.
